t: A Song of Praise to the Lord for His Salvation and Judgment
Oh,*pn sing to the Lord*s a new song! For*ld He has done marvelous things; His*ld right hand and His holy arm have gained Him the victory.
The*ld Lord*s has made known His salvation; His*ld righteousness He has revealed in the sight of the nations.
He*ld has remembered His mercy and His faithfulness to the house of Israel; All*ld the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Shout*ln joyfully to the Lord,*s all the earth; Break*ld forth in song, rejoice, and sing praises.
Sing*ld to the Lord*s with the harp, With*ld the harp and the sound of a psalm,
With*ld trumpets and the sound of a horn; Shout*ld joyfully before the Lord,*s the King.
Let*ln the sea roar, and all its fullness, The*ld world and those who dwell in it;
Let*ld the rivers clap their*i hands; Let*ld the hills be joyful together before the Lord,*s
For*ld He is coming to judge the earth. With*ld righteousness He shall judge the world, And*ld the peoples with equity.
